days.title: 13 days until christmas
days.message: Here's to some new year resolutions that probably includes working out of sorts
days.caption: I was gonna get you one already and then you went and put it on your secret santa wishlist - Aiyah, so I just checked it off and bought it. Come redeem.

days.title: happy friday the 13th!
days.message:
Since it's about to be the weekend and weekend means drinking and drinking means quad shots 
 Don't worry! 
 I've secured you a sub a friend card in the form of AQT!
days.caption: Hehehe, show AQT this when you don't want your quad or single - what a homie!

days.title: happy saturday!
days.message: I'm really glad I get to spend my weekends with my bb gurl - let's do a mask today!
days.caption: Can't believe this was one the first times you slept over and we were comfy enuf to do face masks, just chilling in bed. O.o

days.title: part one of the secret santa festivities!
days.message: Also the day before a work day, sadge. I got you something from Costco to help keep you warm!
